column7: Ceramic material fundamentals, emphasizing structure-property relations. Development, use, and control of the properties of a wide variety of ceramic materials from a physico-chemical point of view. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: MSE 401. Credit or concurrent registration in MSE 405.
column9: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: MSE 401. Credit or concurrent registration in MSE 405.
